description:
The use of coaching is developing in various Spanish universities as an aid for both teachers in their mentoring projects and tutorials, as well as students in the development of personal, instrumental skills and attitude. Its use has been widely demonstrated and developed in the U.S. and many European countries, in the cross-curricular development of all students and teachers.
Knowledge required:
Not required

                                            Syllabus
                        Module 0: Introduction.
Module 1: Introduction to Coaching.
Module 2: Emotions and beliefs.
Module 3: Effective communication
Module 4. Process change
Module 5: Overcoming resistance
Module 6: Emotional Intelligence.
Module 7: Neuro Linguistic Programming (NLP)
Module 8: Tools Coaching I.
Module 9: Coaching Tools II.
title: Habilidades y competencias a través del coaching personal
